org.apache.hadoop.io

Class SequenceFile.Sorter.MergeQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.util.PriorityQueue
      • org.apache.hadoop.io.SequenceFile.Sorter.MergeQueue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SequenceFile.Sorter.RawKeyValueIterator
    Enclosing class:
    SequenceFile.Sorter

    private class SequenceFile.Sorter.MergeQueue
extends PriorityQueue
implements SequenceFile.Sorter.RawKeyValueIterator
    This class implements the core of the merge logic

                              Path tmpDir,

        A queue of file segments to merge
        Parameters:
        segments - the file segments to merge
        tmpDir - a relative local directory to save intermediate files in
        progress - the reference to the Progressable object
